title: Gelarmony - Colli Portuensi
description: Sicilian gelateria with multiple locations. Offers around 16 vegan gelato with flavors like cinnamon, pistachio, walnut. Has soy cream as topping, vegan cones. Also offers Sicilian granita and confectionary specialties like cannoli and cassata. This venue is located 5km south of the city centre in Monteverde neighborhood.
